Name: Loaded Charge - Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Tapping it will make Yuan Ye charge toward the target, dealing <color=#0f70bc>100%</color> Physical DMG. If Yuan Ye hits the enemy, it will knock the enemy again to deal <color=#0f70bc>200%</color> Physical DMG and stun the enemy for <color=#0f70bc>2s</color>.

Name: Radiative Shock - Barrier - Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Tapping it will make Noctua fly one circle around the character currently in control, dealing <color=#0f70bc>160%</color> Physical DMG to the enemies nearby while granting the character Super Armor for <color=#0f70bc>3s</color> and a shield with capacity equal to <color=#0f70bc>40%</color> of the CUB's Attack for 10s.

Tapping it will make Noctua fly one circle around the character currently in control, dealing <color=#0f70bc>160%</color> Ice DMG to the enemies nearby while granting the character Super Armor for <color=#0f70bc>3s</color> and a shield with capacity equal to <color=#0f70bc>40%</color> of the CUB's Attack for 10s.

Name: Awakening Flash - Physical
Desc: After pinging a total of 6 basic Signal Orbs, the CUB button will become available. Tapping it will make Toniris charge forward, dealing <color=#0f70bc>300%</color> Physical DMG and pulling the enemies toward its charging path, while inflicting them with <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> for 8s. Physical attacks can detonate the <color=#0f70bc>Explosion</color> and cause <color=#0f70bc>120%</color> Physical Area DMG. Also causes <color=#935ee1>Data Attack</color>.

Frost Oath will stomp from above, dealing <color=#0f70bc>150%</color> Fire DMG and applying <color=#935ee1>Rigidness</color> to the target and generate a <color=#935ee1>Snowthorn Forest</color> field, dealing <color=#0f70bc>25%</color> Fire DMG for <color=#0f70bc>4s</color>. Adds <color=#935ee1>Data ATK</color>. <color=#935ee1>Rigidness</color>: Enemies will be snared for 2s.

Upon casting, Moonhopper will teleport into the air and smash to the ground, interrupting enemy skills, dealing <color=#0f70bc>600%</color> Ice DMG, and creating an Anti-gravity Field that deals <color=#0f70bc>60%</color> Ice DMG to all enemies inside every 0.5s for 4s. Enemies inside the Anti-gravity field will be slowed down and unable to use their skills.

After casting, Dawn Chorus will charge toward the enemy from a distance in mid-air, dealing <color=#FF6347>1250%</color> Physical DMG while granting the equipped character Super Armor for <color=#0f70bc>3</color>s and Shield equal to <color=#0f70bc>200%</color> of the CUB's ATK for 10s.
